titleStmt.title: Von John Maynard Keynes an Ludwig Wittgenstein, 25. 6. 1919
titleStmt.author: Keynes, John Maynard

list.item: 2007/06: Conversion from Folio Flat File to XML

div.p: Your book has safely reached me and I am forwarding it immediately to Russell. As soon as peace is safely signed, is there any good likelihood of our seeing you in England?

I had nearly finished my book on Probability in the summer of 1914 and most of it, indeed, was actually in print. But the war stopped all such thoughts. I hope now soon to take it up again and at last publish early next year.
